law.catch_line: If an inmate is committed to the custody of the Commissioner of Correction or transferred to another...
law.text:
If an inmate is committed to the custody of the Commissioner of Correction or transferred to another local correctional facility:
the inmate's record of accrued diminution credits shall be forwarded to the receiving correctional facility; and
the receiving correctional facility shall apply the credits to reduce the inmate's term of confinement.
